vernac_cmds: From mathcomp Require ssreflect ssrbool ssrfun bigop.
Lemma seq_peel_begin: forall (n l: nat) (LPOS: l > 0), n :: seq (S n) (l - 1) = seq n l.
Lemma cons_append: forall {A: Type} (a: A) (l l': list A), (cons a l) ++ l' = cons a (l ++ l').
replace ((a0 :: a :: l) ++ l') with (a0 :: ((a:: l) ++ l')).
Lemma seq_peel_end: forall (n l: nat) (L_GT_0: l > 0), seq n l = (seq n (l - 1)) ++ [ n + l - 1].
assert (SEQ_S_N: seq (S n) l = seq (S n) (l - 1) ++ [S n + l - 1]).
assert (n :: seq (S n) (l - 1) = seq n l).
replace ( n :: seq (S n) (l - 1) ++ [S n + l - 1]) with ((n :: seq (S n) (l - 1)) ++ [S n + l - 1]).
replace (S n + l) with (n + S l).
Parameter (plus mult minus : R -> R-> R).
Parameter rt : ring_theory zero one plus mult minus sym (@eq R).
Class LoopVariant (A R : Type) := { evalAtIx: A -> nat -> R }.
Global Instance loopVariantFn (R: Type): LoopVariant (nat -> R) (R : Type) := { evalAtIx (f: nat -> R) (n: nat) := f n }.
Definition scaleLoopVariantFn (r: R) (f: nat -> R): nat -> R := fun n => r * (f n).
Definition const {A B: Type} (x: A) (y: B) := x.
Inductive BR := | mkBR : R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (nat -> R) -> BR.
Notation "'{{' const ',' bop ',' fn '}}'" := (mkBR const bop fn) (at level 30).
Definition evalBR (br: BR) (n: nat): R := match br with | mkBR r0 binop f => let vals : list R := map f (seq 1 n) in fold_left binop vals r0 end.
Global Instance loopVariantBR : LoopVariant BR R := { evalAtIx (br: BR) (n: nat) := evalBR br n }.
Class ToBR A : Type := { toBR : A -> BR }.
Global Instance liftConstantToBR : ToBR R := { toBR (c: R) := mkBR c plus (const zero) }.
Global Instance liftBRToBR: ToBR BR := { toBR br := br }.
Lemma liftConstant_eval: forall (n: nat) (r: R), evalAtIx (toBR r) n = r.
replace (S n - 1)%nat with n; try omega.
Lemma evalBR_step: forall `{Ring R} (r0: R) (bop: R -> R -> R) (f: nat -> R) (n : nat), ({{r0, bop, f}}) # (S n) = bop ((mkBR r0 bop f) # n) (f # (S n)).
assert (STRIP_LAST: seq 2 (S n) = seq 2 (S n - 1) ++ [2 + (S n) - 1]).
Lemma evalBR_funext_delta: forall `{Ring R} (n: nat) (c: R) (f1 f2: nat -> R) (bop: R -> R -> R) (FUNEXT: forall (n: nat), f1 n = f2 n), {{c, bop, f1}} # n = {{c, bop, f2 }} # n.
Lemma add_constant_add_br: forall `{Ring R} (n: nat), ((toBR c) # n) + {{r0, plus, f}} # n = {{(r0 + c), plus, f}} # n.
replace (toBR c # (S n)) with (toBR c # n).
Lemma mul_constant_add_br: forall `{Ring R} (n: nat), ((toBR c) # n) * ((mkBR r0 plus f) # n) = (mkBR (c * r0) plus (scaleLoopVariantFn c f)) # n.
replace (toBR c # (S n)) with (toBR c # n).
replace ((toBR c # n) * (f # (S n))) with ((scaleLoopVariantFn c f) # (S n)).
Lemma mul_constant_mul_br: forall `{Ring R} (n: nat), c * ({{r0, mult, f}} # n) = {{r0 * c, mult, f}} # n.
Definition add_add_br_add_br: forall `{Ring R} (n: nat) (c1 c2: R) (f1 f2: nat -> R), ({{c1, plus, f1 }} # n) + ({{c2, plus, f2}} # n) = ({{ (c1 + c2), plus, (fun n => f1 n + f2 n) }}) # n.
replace ((mkBR c1 plus f1 # n) + (f1 # (S n)) + (mkBR c2 plus f2 # n) + (f2 # (S n))) with ((mkBR c1 plus f1 # n) + (mkBR c2 plus f2 # n) + (f1 # (S n)) + (f2 # (S n))); try ring.
Definition mulCRFn `{Ring R} (c1 c2: R) (f1 f2: nat -> R) (n: nat): R:= (((f2 # n) * {{c1, plus, f1}} # (n - 1)) + ((f1 # n) * {{c2, plus, f2}} # (n - 1)) + (f1 # n) * (f2 # n)).
Lemma mul_add_br_add_br: forall `{Ring R} (c1 c2: R) (f1 f2: nat -> R) (n: nat), ({{c1, plus, f1}} # n) * ({{c2, plus, f2}} # n) = ((mkBR (c1 * c2) plus (mulCRFn c1 c2 f1 f2)) # n).

replace ({{c1, plus, f1}} # n * {{c2, plus, f2}} # n + {{c1, plus, f1}} # n * f2 (S n) + f1 (S n) * {{c2, plus, f2}} # n + f1 (S n) * f2 (S n)) with ({{c1, plus, f1}} # n * {{c2, plus, f2}} # n + ({{c1, plus, f1}} # n * f2 (S n) + {{c2, plus, f2}} # n * f1 (S n) + f1 (S n) * f2 (S n))); try ring.

replace ({{c1, plus, f1}} # n * f2 (S n) + {{c2, plus, f2}} # n * f1 (S n) + f1 (S n) * f2 (S n)) with (mulCRFn c1 c2 f1 f2 (S n)); try (unfold mulCRFn; simpl; replace (n - 0)%nat with n; try omega; auto; ring; fail).
Lemma mul_mul_br_mul_br: forall `{Ring R} (n: nat) (r1 r2: R) (f1 f2: nat -> R), ({{r1, mult, f1}} # n) * ({{r2, mult, f2}} # n) = ((mkBR (r1 * r2) mult (fun n => (f1 n * f2 n))) # n).
replace ((mkBR r1 mult f1 # n) * (f1 # (S n)) * (mkBR r2 mult f2 # n) * (f2 # (S n))) with ((mkBR r1 mult f1 # n) * (mkBR r2 mult f2 # n) * (f1 # (S n)) * (f2 # (S n))); try ring.
Notation "'{{' const ',' bop ',' fn '}}'" := (mkBR const bop fn) (at level 30): recurrence_scope.
Inductive CR := | liftBRToCR: BR -> CR | recurCR: R -> (R -> R -> R) -> CR -> CR .
Fixpoint CR_to_BR (cr: CR): BR := match cr with | liftBRToCR br => br | recurCR r0 bop cr' => mkBR r0 bop (evalAtIx (CR_to_BR cr')) end.
Definition evalCR(cr: CR) (n: nat): R := (CR_to_BR cr) # n.
Lemma evalBR_CR_to_BR: forall (cr: CR) (n: nat), evalBR (CR_to_BR cr) n = evalCR cr n.
Global Instance loopVariantCR : LoopVariant CR R := { evalAtIx (cr: CR) (n: nat) := evalCR cr n }.
Lemma creval_lift_br_to_cr_inverses: forall (br: BR) (n: nat), (liftBRToCR br) # n = br # n.
Lemma evalCR_zero: forall `{Ring R} (cr': CR) (r: R) (bop: R -> R -> R), (recurCR r bop cr') # 0 = r.
Lemma evalCR_step: forall `{Ring R} (cr': CR) (r: R) (bop: R -> R -> R) (n: nat), (recurCR r bop cr') # (S n) = bop ((recurCR r bop cr') # n) ((evalAtIx (CR_to_BR cr')) # (S n)).
Lemma add_const_to_CR: forall `{Ring R} (r c0: R) (cr: CR) (n: nat), r + ((recurCR c0 plus cr) # n) = ((recurCR (c0 + r) plus cr) # n).
Lemma mul_const_to_CR: forall `{Ring R} (r c0: R) (cr: CR) (n: nat), r * ((recurCR c0 mult cr) # n) = ((recurCR (c0 * r) mult cr) # n).
Inductive PureCR (bop: R -> R -> R): Type := | PureBR: R -> R -> PureCR bop | PureCRRec: R -> PureCR bop -> PureCR bop .
Fixpoint purecr_to_cr (bop: R -> R -> R) (pure: PureCR bop): CR := match pure with | PureBR r1 r2 => liftBRToCR (mkBR r1 bop (const r2)) | PureCRRec r cr' => (recurCR r bop (purecr_to_cr cr')) end.
Lemma purecr_to_cr_eval_cr_inverses: forall `{Ring R} (bop: R -> R -> R) (r1 r2: R) (n: nat), purecr_to_cr (PureBR bop r1 r2) # n = {{r1, bop, (const r2)}} # n.
Global Instance loopVariantPureCR (f: R -> R -> R): LoopVariant (PureCR f) (R : Type) := { evalAtIx (purecr: PureCR f) (n: nat) := (purecr_to_cr purecr) # n }.
Lemma evalPureCR_zero: forall `{Ring R} (bop: R -> R -> R) (r: R) (pcr': PureCR bop), (PureCRRec r pcr') # 0 = r.
Lemma evalPureCR_step: forall `{Ring R} (n: nat) (bop: R -> R -> R) (r: R) (pcr': PureCR bop), (PureCRRec r pcr') # (S n) = bop ((PureCRRec r pcr') # n) (pcr' # (S n)).

Fixpoint zip_purecrs_eq_len {bop: R -> R -> R} (cr1 cr2: PureCR bop): option (PureCR bop) := match (cr1, cr2) with | (PureCRRec r1 cr'1, PureCRRec r2 cr'2) => option_map (PureCRRec (bop r1 r2)) (zip_purecrs_eq_len cr'1 cr'2) | (PureBR r11 r12, PureBR r21 r22) => Some (PureBR bop (bop r11 r21) (bop r12 r22)) | _ => None end.
Lemma rewrite_pure_sum_cr_on_add_cr: forall `{Ring R} (cr1 cr2: PureSumCR) (pureout: PureSumCR) (ZIP: zip_purecrs_eq_len cr1 cr2 = Some pureout) (n: nat), cr1 # n + cr2 # n = pureout # n.
induction cr1 as [begin1 delta1 | begin1' cr1].
induction cr2 as [begin2 delta2 | begin2' cr2].
induction cr2 as [begin2 delta2 | begin2' cr2].
destruct (zip_purecrs_eq_len cr1 cr2) eqn:ZIP_CR1_CR2; simpl in ZIP; inversion ZIP.

replace ((PureCRRec begin1' cr1) # n + cr1 # (S n) + (PureCRRec begin2' cr2) # n + cr2 # (S n)) with (((PureCRRec begin1' cr1) # n + (PureCRRec begin2' cr2) # n) + (cr1 # (S n) + cr2 # (S n))); try ring.
assert (CR1_PLUS_CR2: cr1 # (S n) + cr2 # (S n) = p # (S n)).
Lemma rewrite_pure_mul_cr_on_mul_cr: forall `{Ring R} (cr1 cr2: PureProdCR) (pureout: PureProdCR) (ZIP: zip_purecrs_eq_len cr1 cr2 = Some pureout) (n: nat), (cr1 # n) * (cr2 # n) = pureout # n.
induction cr1 as [begin1 delta1 | begin1' cr1].
induction cr2 as [begin2 delta2 | begin2' cr2].
induction cr2 as [begin2 delta2 | begin2' cr2].
destruct (zip_purecrs_eq_len cr1 cr2) eqn:ZIP_CR1_CR2; simpl in ZIP; inversion ZIP.
assert (CR1_PLUS_CR2: cr1 # (S n) * cr2 # (S n) = p # (S n)).

command: replace ((a0 :: a :: l) ++ l') with (a0 :: ((a:: l) ++ l')).
assert (SEQ_S_N: seq (S n) l = seq (S n) (l - 1) ++ [S n + l - 1]).
assert (n :: seq (S n) (l - 1) = seq n l).
replace ( n :: seq (S n) (l - 1) ++ [S n + l - 1]) with ((n :: seq (S n) (l - 1)) ++ [S n + l - 1]).
replace (S n + l) with (n + S l).
replace (S n - 1)%nat with n; try omega.
replace (toBR c # (S n)) with (toBR c # n).
replace (toBR c # (S n)) with (toBR c # n).
replace ((toBR c # n) * (f # (S n))) with ((scaleLoopVariantFn c f) # (S n)).
replace ((mkBR c1 plus f1 # n) + (f1 # (S n)) + (mkBR c2 plus f2 # n) + (f2 # (S n))) with ((mkBR c1 plus f1 # n) + (mkBR c2 plus f2 # n) + (f1 # (S n)) + (f2 # (S n))); try ring.
replace ((mkBR r1 mult f1 # n) * (f1 # (S n)) * (mkBR r2 mult f2 # n) * (f2 # (S n))) with ((mkBR r1 mult f1 # n) * (mkBR r2 mult f2 # n) * (f1 # (S n)) * (f2 # (S n))); try ring.
